department: Department of National Defence, Director Services Contracting 4 (D Svcs C 4)
short_summary: Provide Fire Prevention Week education and training Kits to CAF bases across Canada
description: CF Forces Fire Marshall (CFFM) is mandated to deliver information on fire prevention and safety in both official languages to all Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) bases across Canada to support its Fire Prevention Week campaign
full_summary:
=====================

### Fire Prevention Week Kits

**Tender Reference:** cb-6629-8776990

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Number:** W6369-24-X004

**Date of Publication:** June 23, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** July 17, 2023 (14:00:00 hours)

**Expected Contract Start Date:** August 1, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date:** November 30, 2025

The Canadian Forces Fire Marshall (CFFM) is soliciting bids for the supply of Fire Prevention Week Kits to support its annual campaign. The CFFM requires educational materials to be distributed to the public, with a requirement for up to 110 standard-issue National Fire Prevention Association (NFPA) Fire Prevention Week Kits.

The kits will be used to educate the public on fire prevention and safety, with the same goals as those associated with Fire Prevention Week. Specifically, the CFFM aims to educate the public on how to prevent potentially harmful fires and provide information on surviving fires.

**Trade Agreements**

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization–Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA)

**Procurement Information**

* The procurement is open to all eligible bidders.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contracting Entity**

* Contracting Entity Name: Department of National Defence, Director Services Contracting 4 (D Svcs C 4)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Rogelio Orsetti
	+ Email: rogelio.orsetti@forces.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (613) 715-0853

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Documents**

The RFP documents can be downloaded from: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6629/w6369-24-x004---rf
